rules_text:
Whenever a player loses life for the first time each turn, create a blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Sacrifice a blood token: Target opponent discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, and only once each turn.
rules_text2:
First strike, lifelink
Whenever you create one or more blood tokens, exile target card from a graveyard.
Sacrifice a blood token: Put a +1/+1 counter onto Welt, Nervingald Keeper. Activate this only during your turn, and only once each turn.
